Package org.service

Class Main

java.lang.Object
org.service.Main
public class Main extends Object
The main class for the bus service program.

  • Constructor Details

    • Main

      public Main()

  • Method Details

    • main

      public static void main(String[] args)
      Start point for the bus service program.
      Parameters:
      args - CL arguments passed to the program.

    • startBusService

      public static void startBusService()
      Initiates the bus service and handles user interactions. Displays the bus layout, validates user role, and directs to the corresponding actions.

    • printRoleOptions

      public static void printRoleOptions()
      Print the menu of role options for user selection.

    • validateRole

      public static int validateRole()
      Validates and returns the user role. Displays role options (1.Bus Inspector or 2.Customer), takes user input to return boolean values.
      Returns:
      `1` for Bus Inspector, `2` for Customer, '0' to Exit

    • printBus

      public static void printBus()
      Calls printBusFrontFrame(), printBusInteriorLayout() and printBusBackFrame() to create the bus layout including the seat numbers

    • printBusSeats

      public static void printBusSeats()
      Prints the arranged bus seats by iterating through each row and column in the static 2D bus seats array. 
           This method prints a new line at the beginning of each row iteration and invokes the printFormattedBusSeats() method for each value in the 2D array.
      After the second loop completes, the printWheels() method is called.

    • printSeat

      public static void printSeat(String seat)
      Converts a seat string, which can be either a number or 'X', into a formatted string. 
           The formatted string is printed using System.out.printf() with a minimum width of 2 spaces.
      Parameters:
      seat - The seat representation to be converted and formatted.

    • printBusFront

      public static void printBusFront()
      Print the front of the bus through System.out.printf()/println() and shows available seats using checkAvailableSeats()

    • printWheels

      public static void printWheels(int row)
           Prints out the wheels at specific rows in the arranged bus seats.
 
           If the provided row index is 0 or 3, the wheels are printed after the first row.
      Parameters:
      row - The current row index in the 2D seats array.

    • printBusBack

      public static void printBusBack()
      Print the front of the bus through multiple System.out.println()

    • printCustomerChoices

      public static void printCustomerChoices()
      Print the menu of choices for customer actions.

    • customerBusSeatChoice

      public static void customerBusSeatChoice()
      Menu of choices for the customer's bus seat actions. Displays menu options, takes user input, and performs actions according to it.

    • findBookedCustomer

      public static void findBookedCustomer()
      Prompt the user for their birthdate and display any found customer booking data.

    • printWindowSeatChoices

      public static void printWindowSeatChoices()
      Print the menu of choices for booking window seats.

    • windowSeatCheck

      public static Boolean windowSeatCheck()
      Checks if the customer wants to book a window seat.
      Returns:
      true if the customer wants a window seat; false otherwise.

    • bookAutomaticWindowSeat

      public static boolean bookAutomaticWindowSeat()
      Books an automatic window seat for a customer.
      Returns:
      true if booking is successful, false otherwise.

    • findCustomerData

      public static String findCustomerData(String birthdate)
      Finds and returns customer data depending on the provided birthdate.
      Parameters:
      birthdate - The birthdate of the customer to do the search with.
      Returns:
      A formatted string containing customer details, or a message if no booking exists with the birthdate.

    • busWindowSeatChoice

      public static void busWindowSeatChoice()
      Processes booking of a window seat in the bus. Displays unbooked window seats, takes user input for seat choice, and processes customer details for booking the seat and books it.

    • getRandomUnbookedWindowSeat

      public static int getRandomUnbookedWindowSeat()
      Gets a random unbooked window seat number.
      Returns:
      a random unbooked window seat number as an integer.

    • requestCustomerDetails

      public static String[] requestCustomerDetails()
      Gets a random unbooked window seat number.
      Returns:
      a random unbooked window seat number as an integer.

    • checkSeatAlreadyBooked

      public static boolean checkSeatAlreadyBooked(int choice)
      Checks if a seat with the given seat number has already been booked.
      Parameters:
      choice - The seat number to check.
      Returns:
      true if the seat is already booked, false otherwise.

    • printBusInspectorChoices

      public static void printBusInspectorChoices()
      Displays menu options for Bus Inspector and prompts for a choice.

    • busInspectorChoice

      public static void busInspectorChoice()
      Menu of choices for the Bus Inspector role. Displays menu options, takes user input, and performs actions according to it. Check profit calls recursive function to get the total profit made. Sort customers

    • printSortedCustomers

      public static void printSortedCustomers()
      Prints customer seat details sorted by age if seats are available.

    • sortCustomers

      public static String[] sortCustomers()
      Sorts customers' seat details by age in older to younger.
      Returns:
      An array of customer seat details sorted by age.

    • displayAllCustomers

      public static void displayAllCustomers()
      Displays the details of all booked customers.

    • getCustomerSingleArray

      public static String[] getCustomerSingleArray()
      Get a single array containing booked seats details.
      Returns:
      An array of booked seat details.

    • add

      public static String[] add(String seat, String[] sortedArray)
      Add a seat to the sorted array of customers.
      Parameters:
      seat - The seat to add.
      sortedArray - The sorted array of customers.
      Returns:
      A new array with the seat added.

    • submitCustomerDetails

      public static boolean submitCustomerDetails(String firstName, String lastName, String birthdate, int choice)
      Concatenates customer details for seat booking. Validates format of date of birth and if valid, formats, prints and books the seat. Returns `true` on success
      Parameters:
      firstName - First name of the customer.
      lastName - Last name of the customer.
      birthdate - Date of birth of the customer.
      choice - Seat choice.
      Returns:
      `true` if valid details and booked seat, otherwise `false`.

    • bookSeat

      public static void bookSeat(String seat)
      Book a specific seat in the bus layout.
      Parameters:
      seat - The seat to be booked.

    • cancelBooking

      public static void cancelBooking(String seatNumber)
      Remove a specific seat in the bus layout.
      Parameters:
      seatNumber - The seat to be unbooked.

    • getUnbookedWindowSeats

      public static String getUnbookedWindowSeats()
      Retrieves unbooked window seats from the bus layout.
      Returns:
      An appended string containing unbooked window seats or a message if none are available.

    • getFormattedCustomerDetails

      public static String getFormattedCustomerDetails(String csv)
      Prints full name, birthdate, and seat number formatted from customer details extracted from CSV string
      Parameters:
      csv - CSV string containing customer details.
      Returns:
      Formatted customer details in an order.

    • formatCustomerDetails

      public static String formatCustomerDetails(String firstName, String lastName, String dateOfBirth, int busNumber)
      Formats and creates a booked seat CSV details string.
      Parameters:
      firstName - First name of the passenger.
      lastName - Last name of the passenger.
      dateOfBirth - Date of birth of the passenger. (YYYYMMDD)
      busNumber - Bus number associated with the booking.
      Returns:
      Formatted string containing booked seat details.

    • getAvailableSeats

      public static int getAvailableSeats()
      Counts the number of available seats in the bus.
      Returns:
      number of available seats.

    • getBirthdate

      public static String getBirthdate(String seat)
      Get the birthdate of a customer from seat details.
      Parameters:
      seat - The customer's seat details.
      Returns:
      The customer's birthdate.

    • checkBookedSeat

      public static boolean checkBookedSeat(String seat)
      Checks if a seat is booked.
      Parameters:
      seat - Seat CSV containing booking confirmation.
      Returns:
      Booking status of the seat.

    • getSeatNumber

      public static String getSeatNumber(String seat)
      Takes in a CSV formatted String and calls the method splitString() for the array, then fetches the booked bus seat number.
      Parameters:
      seat - CSV formatted String containing seat information.
      Returns:
      Returns the booked seat number.

    • getFullName

      public static String getFullName(String seat)
      Extracts full name from seat String CSV .
      Parameters:
      seat - Seat CSV containing name information.
      Returns:
      Concatenated first name and last name.

    • currentAgeCheck

      public static int currentAgeCheck(String seat)
      Checks the age based on the birth year extracted from a csv seat details String. If seat has more than 2 characters, it extracts the birth year from the seat information using the splittedString() method and calculates age.
      Parameters:
      seat - The seat representation containing CSV formatted details.
      Returns:
      0 if the calculated age is 18 or older, 1 if it's younger than 18, and 2 if unable to determine.

    • getAge

      public static int getAge(String seat)
      Calculate the age of a customer.
      Parameters:
      seat - The customer's seat details.
      Returns:
      The customer's age.

    • getTotalProfit

      public static double getTotalProfit(int currentRow, int currentColumn, double profit)
      Recursively calculates the profit within a 2D array using the currentAgeCheck() function.
      Parameters:
      currentRow - The current currentRow index, starting from 0 up to array.length.
      currentColumn - The current currentColumn index within the currentRow, accessed through the 2D array.
      profit - The current totalProfit
      Returns:
      The calculated profit as a double value.

    • getProfit

      public static double getProfit()
      Calculate the total profit made from booked seats in the bus.
      Returns:
      The total profit as a double value.

    • cancelBooking

      public static void cancelBooking()
      Cancels a booking based on the customer's birthdate.

    • getCustomerDetails

      public static String[] getCustomerDetails(String csvDetails)
      Splits a comma-separated value (CSV) formatted string into an array of individual values.
      Parameters:
      csvDetails - The input string in CSV format.
      Returns:
      An array containing the individual values split from the CSV string.

    • printError

      public static void printError(String error)
      Prints an error message to the console.
      Parameters:
      error - The error message to be printed.

    • formatBirthdate

      public static String formatBirthdate(String birthdate)
      Takes in a string that is formatted in CSV to extract the date of birth (YYYYMMDD) and reformat it to (YYYY-MM-DD).
      Parameters:
      birthdate - CSV formatted details about the customer.
      Returns:
      Returns the reformatted birthdate
